group_1.textLeft: Thanks for the meal!@Ahhh, it's delicious today as well!

group_1.textRight: You're eating even faster than usual today...

group_1.textLeft: I've got something to show Manaka today!

group_1.textRight: Show me?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I've been posting a review of Walnut's@every day...
I managed to get responses from plenty of@people!

group_1.textRight: .........[wait:1.0][chara:300902:lipSynch_1]Really?

group_1.textLeft: Ta-da, look!

group_1.narration: â– Comments (13)@Anonymous: Walnut's? Never heard of them.@Anonymous: Seriously. Heavenly delicious?@Anonymous: Too much praise. Obvious marketing.@Anonymous: Welp, it's probably just a sham.

group_1.textRight: What's with these weird comments?!

group_1.textLeft: If they come to the restaurant, they'll see@that I'm not lying, so don't worry!

group_1.textRight: Maybe so, but...
Well, it's fine if you don't try so hard@to post a review.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: You don't have to go this far.@As long as my father and I are cooking...
Customers will naturally come to us!

group_1.textLeft: .........[wait:1.0][chara:302401:cheek_0][chara:302401:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json:motion_300][chara:302401:lipSynch_1]Yeah, that's right, of course it is.
...Oh, I should probably get going.
Hey, Ria-senpai, if you want, let's@walk home together!

group_1.textRight: Huh, me...?@Well, I don't mind...

group_1.textLeft: Yay! Well then, we should get going!
Thanks for the food, Manaka!

group_1.textCenter: Thank you very much, please come again!

group_1.textRight: ...So, what's the meaning of you bringing me@to a diner?

group_1.textLeft: I needed your advice...

group_1.textRight: ...Advice?

group_1.textLeft: I want to be more useful to Manaka!
What should I do, Senpai?

group_1.textRight: ...Didn't Manaka tell you earlier?
She said as long as they keep making good food,@the customers will eventually increase.

group_1.textLeft: B-but, there are many restaurants that go@out of business even if they're delicious!
I've been eating out as a hobby since I was@a little girl.
And I've seen a lot of restaurants like that...

group_1.textRight: Sorry to keep you waiting,@here's your large bowl of pilaf!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's mine!@Thank you very much.

group_1.textRight: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]When did you order that?!@And it's even such a huge serving?!

group_1.textLeft: I can't think straight if I don't eat well!
Um, so I...
From now on...what should I do...

group_1.narration: *Munch Munch Munch Munch*@*Munch Munch Munch Munch*

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ahhhh, it's so delicious...!
Even at this price, it has a nice, buttery flavor...
And best of all, it's full of plump shrimp!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Either chew or chat, pick only one!!

group_1.textLeft: I-I'm sorry...!@It's so delicious, I just...

group_1.textRight: *Sigh*@Good grief...
You're making me want to eat it too...
(Wait, that means...)
(She may actually have talent as a@reviewer...)
(This girl could be something if she@trains hard enough...)
I've got it!

group_1.textLeft: Ria-senpai, what's gotten into you so suddenly...?

group_1.textRight: I've come up with a way to make you useful!

group_1.textLeft: Waaah, really?!@What is it?

group_1.textRight: Heh heh, Listen carefully!@First of all...

group_1.textLeft: I-I see! So that's possible!
You're amazing! Not only are you beautiful,@but you're smart, too!

group_1.textRight: Hohohohoho!@You may sing my praises even more!

group_1.textLeft: Okay, tomorrow we'll start the@Tsumugi Level-Up Operation!
